CustomField.description: Checkbox field to track whether or not a Section record should be scored when its parent Submission is reviewed. If marked as TRUE, then the Section is displayed with an input field for a score in the SubmissionResponseScoring component.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this checkbox to enable or prevent reviewers from assigning a score to this section. If unchecked, users will not be able to score the section and it will not display in the radar charts.
CustomField.label: Is Scored
